page.title: 09DEVONSHIRE PARK
page.content:
Devonshire Park Eastbourne has what is reputed to be the best grass tennis courts in the country apart from Wimbledon. It is frequently the venue for Great Britain's Davis Cup matches. In the week before Wimbledon it also stages a tournament for ladies .This attracts many of the top lady players,who use it as an opportunity to practise on grass before Wimbledon. It is aLocal Authority amenity and any member of the public can hire a court when they are not being used for tournaments. It is also possible to hire badminton, squash,and table_tennis courts.
Helen Newby.
